I am updating the question that building from source has the same problem with 2 GPUs. It seems to me that Tensor-Flow can only work with single GPU.

I am posting the newest detail of my infrastructure:

Hardware:
Google Cloud Compute Engine
NVIDIA Tesla K80 * 2

Software:
Ubuntu 14.04
CUDA 8.0
cuDNN 5.0
Tensor-Flow up-to-date with master branch
